## Complete Badge Set for README

Here's a suggested badge layout for your README:

```markdown
# BilimDeck

[![CI](https://github.com/kho-ja/bilimdeck/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kho-ja/bilimdeck/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![CodeQL](https://github.com/kho-ja/bilimdeck/actions/workflows/codeql.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kho-ja/bilimdeck/actions/workflows/codeql.yml)
![Django](https://img.shields.io/badge/Django-5.2.8-092E20?style=flat&logo=django&logoColor=white)
![Next.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Next.js-16.0.1-000000?style=flat&logo=next.js&logoColor=white)
![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-3.11%20%7C%203.12-3776AB?style=flat&logo=python&logoColor=white)
![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.x-3178C6?style=flat&logo=typescript&logoColor=white)
![Code Style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)

A full-stack web application with Django REST Framework backend and Next.js + shadcn/ui frontend.
```

## Custom Badges

You can create custom badges at [shields.io](https://shields.io/):

```markdown
![Custom Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Your-Label-color?style=flat&logo=logoname&logoColor=white)
```

### Common Logo Names
- `python`
- `django`
- `javascript`
- `typescript`
- `react`
- `next.js`
- `tailwindcss`
- `github`
- `github-actions`
- `docker`
- `postgresql`
- `redis`
- `nginx`

### Badge Styles
- `flat` - Flat style (recommended)
- `flat-square` - Flat square style
- `for-the-badge` - Large badge style
- `plastic` - Plastic style
- `social` - Social style (for stars/forks)

---

**Note**: Badges will automatically update as your workflows run and complete.
